DOC.brief_summary: The study objective : 1 . To compare cardiovascular function type 2 diabetes patient vs. healthy control . 2 . To compare effect 8 week aerobic interval training versus continuous moderate exercise cardiovascular function adult type 2 diabetes . 3 . To examine mechanisms underlie exercise-related change cardiovascular function . The investigator hypothesize compare continuous moderate intensity exercise training , interval train effective improve cardiovascular function adult type 2 diabetes .
DOC.brief_title: Effect Aerobic Interval Training Cardiovascular Function Type 2 Diabetes
DOC.detailed_description: Cardiovascular function measure baseline adult type 2 diabetes age-matched healthy control . Research volunteer type 2 diabetes meet inclusion criterion randomize aerobic interval training group , continuous moderate exercise group non-exercise control group . At end 8-week randomize control exercise intervention , baseline measure repeat .
DOC.criteria: Inclusion Criteria type 2 diabetes : Diagnosis type 2 diabetes Sedentary minimally physically active least prior 1 year Able give consent Inclusion criterion healthy control group : Sedentary minimally physically active least prior 1 year Able give consent History diabetic proliferative retinopathy , autonomic peripheral neuropathy History relevant cardiovascular disease ( myocardial infarction , angina pectoris , history coronary artery bypass surgery angioplasty , congestive heart failure , arrhythmia ) Hypertension ( ≥160 mmHg systolic ≥100 mmHg diastolic ) History renal impairment History gout hyperuricemia History hepatic disease infection hepatitis B , C History seizure , relevant ongoing recurrent illness Recent ( within 3 month ) recurrent hospitalization Use tobacco product > 5 % weight change prior 6 month . Current intake medication may affect study result Premenopausal woman take oral contraceptive postmenopausal woman take hormone replacement therapy . Pregnancy ( positive urine pregnancy test ) lactation For healthy control group , history diabetes .
